channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1506402408930459657
item.description: No, Ruperto, que tengas unos datos agregados por períodos que tu definiste como se te dió la gana no es tener datos abiertos. Ruperto, casi cualquier entidad del Estado. Hoy como casi siempre @UnidadVictimas

item.title: #en @ 1506378887688822794
item.description:
We added this section to our article on why the @IEA data should be publicly available https://t.co/dsO9vkEozS
Researchers, policy makers, & the public need data on the trade of fossil fuels.
Through our taxes we all pay the @IEA to produce it, but they keep it behind paywalls. https://t.co/6wJNyr7nyi

item.title: #en @ 1506359868181078020
item.description:
The #OpenData Inventory #ODIN measures how complete a country’s statistical offerings are and whether their #data meet international standards of #openness.
👉 See #ODIN2021 to see coverage and openness indicators on water on the #WorldWaterDay!
#OpenSource #OpenSourceSoftware https://t.co/sd4bvSgk6C

item.title: #en @ 1506347290440650760
item.description: FYI - As expected, I'm getting blowback from some Coonley parents about the Tribune calling me to ask about the spike in Covid cases. This was all public information. I'm not even a "whistleblower" - this was open data on @CPSCovid. That talking about it has caused 'disruption.'

item.title: #de @ 1506342306030526464
item.description: Den Aufwand, das WiReg zu durchsuchen, könnte man verteilen/crowdsourcen, indem man das Register frei durchsuchbar macht (statt 3€/Abfrage) oder es gleich als #opendata bereitstellt - siehe hierzu auch https://t.co/0oiZxmRBQI https://t.co/h0IjoLFwxU https://t.co/asANbh75xz

item.title: #it @ 1506336503118667777
item.description: @vi__enne @OpencovidM @Cartabellotta @Rb_Bat @Ruffino_Lorenzo @fbranda94 @p_finocchiaro @RobiVil @accdavlo @istsupsan @MinisteroSalute @s_brusaferro Se questi dati fossero stati/venissero forniti machine readable #opendata (cc @GiorgiaLodi @napo @aborruso @ondatait) certe analisi si sarebbero potute fare tempestivamente contrastando la narrazione "raffreddorizzazione in atto" di M.B. e G.S. (ometto nomi x pietà nei loro cfr)

item.title: #en @ 1506331268870549513
item.description:
Following yesterday's OSINT discussion
1. I see some OSINTers use this concept: this is open data, we use it because it is not prohibited, and so on. But they ignore the consequences. It's not a cabinet discussion. Those tweets have an impact.

item.description: También hubiera preferido que esa información fuera un poco más accesible desde su origen para que no hicieran falta intermediarios. Datos abiertos y accesibles hacen que el ecosistema de investigación los aproveche mucho más.

item.title: #en @ 1506199268750770179
item.description:

Check how the #TotalSuspendedMatter (TSM) in the #NorthAdriatic changes during the year

item.description: Our work on #opendata was featured in the AI Report 2022 from @StanfordHAI. Great to see that our work is used by many others to perform research at the intersection of #AI and #gastroenterology. This would not be possible without the help of our MDs @ThomasdeLange1 @sravmd++ #AI

item.title: #nl @ 1506160192718884867
item.description: Midlifecrisis? Op deze leeftijd waren/zijn mannen zo oud als de gemiddelde resterende levensverwachting: Hier voor de in 1910 (37,4 jaar), 1930 (38,2 jaar), 1950 (41,0 jaar), 1970 (42,3 jaar) geborenen. Schoof rond 1 jaar per 20 jaar op. @statistiekcbs https://t.co/Qfmvpw3WUk https://t.co/7P7r26aUyU

item.title: #pt @ 1506105010937122823
item.description: @anappellegrino @raduan_ @goescarlos @fbizzarroneto @jessiebullock Respondendo informalmente sua pergunta sobre as eleições de 1992, esse período foi de transição entre o sistema manual de votação e o eletrônico. Por isso, não temos tudo digitalizado ainda. Há uma intenção de complementarmos o Portal de Dados Abertos do TSE com as municipais...

item.title: #pt @ 1506104225994092549
item.description: @anappellegrino @raduan_ @goescarlos @fbizzarroneto @jessiebullock Boa noite, Ana e pessoal! Eu sou André, Analista Judiciário do TSE, faço parte do Grupo de Trabalhos de Dados Abertos do Tribunal e fui um dos responsáveis pela digitalização e estruturação dos dados eleitorais do período de 1933 a 1990.

A friend let me know one of my Kaggle datasets showed up in @pbump's "How to Read This Chart" newsletter.
It's always great to learn about how open data is getting used once it's out there in the world. Like getting a postcard from an old friend. 😁

item.description:
@madmaffie Klinkt mooi, willen werken, zodra ze mogen komt er weinig van terecht. 53% vd NL bijstandsuitkeringen gaat naar 14,4% niet-Westerse migranten; 9% gaat naar de 10,9% Westerse migranten. Niet-westerse zéggen te willen werken, Westerse migranten dóén het.

item.title: #es @ 1505114085486116867
item.description:
La descarga de datos es un clic. Sin embargo, la versión oficial de esto mismo requiere de la instalación de un programa Java que viene con un manual PDF de 32 páginas. Y no es que sea viejo: es del año pasado. Cutre y caro.
Esta gente está chalada.
🔗 https://t.co/IvsA9Rv9zV https://t.co/yIhE8z6a9G
